00083 short Micropolis::makeTrafficAt(int x, int y, ZoneType dest)
00084 {
00085     Position pos;
00086     pos.posX = x;
00087     pos.posY = y;
00088 
00089     if (tryDrive(pos, dest)) { /* attempt to drive somewhere */
00090         addToTrafficDensityMap(); /* if sucessful, inc trafdensity */
00091         return 1;             /* traffic passed */
00092     }
00093 
00094     return 0;                 /* traffic failed */
00095 }
00096 
00097 
00106 short Micropolis::makeTraffic(int x, int y, ZoneType dest)
00107 {
00108     Position startPos;
00109     startPos.posX = x;
00110     startPos.posY = y;
00111     return makeTraffic(startPos, dest);
00112 }
00113 
00114 
00122 short Micropolis::makeTraffic(const Position &startPos, ZoneType dest)
00123 {
00124     curMapStackPointer = 0; // Clear position stack
00125 
00126     Position pos(startPos);
00127 
00128 #if 0
00129       if ((!getRandom(2)) && findPerimeterTelecom(pos)) {
00130         /* printf("Telecom!\n"); */
00131         return 1;
00132       }
00133 #endif
00134 
00135     if (findPerimeterRoad(&pos)) { /* look for road on zone perimeter */
00136 
00137         if (tryDrive(pos, dest)) { /* attempt to drive somewhere */
00138             addToTrafficDensityMap(); /* if sucessful, inc trafdensity */
00139             return 1;             /* traffic passed */
00140         }
00141 
00142         return 0;                 /* traffic failed */
00143     } else {
00144         return -1;                /* no road found */
00145     }
00146 }

00148 
00153 void Micropolis::addToTrafficDensityMap()
00154 {
00155     /* For each saved position of the drive */
00156     while (curMapStackPointer > 0) {
00157 
00158         Position pos = pullPos();
00159         if (pos.testBounds()) {
00160 
00161             MapTile tile = map[pos.posX][pos.posY] & LOMASK;
00162 
00163             if (tile >= ROADBASE && tile < POWERBASE) {
00164                 SimSprite *sprite;
00165 
00166                 // Update traffic density.
00167                 int traffic = trafficDensityMap.worldGet(pos.posX, pos.posY);
00168                 traffic += 50;
00169                 traffic = min(traffic, 240);
00170                 trafficDensityMap.worldSet(pos.posX, pos.posY, (Byte)traffic);
00171 
00172                 // Check for heavy traffic.
00173                 if (traffic >= 240 && getRandom(5) == 0) {
00174 
00175                     trafMaxX = pos.posX;
00176                     trafMaxY = pos.posY;
00177 
00178                     /* Direct helicopter towards heavy traffic */
00179                     sprite = getSprite(SPRITE_HELICOPTER);
00180                     if (sprite != NULL && sprite->control == -1) {
00181 
00182                         sprite->destX = trafMaxX * 16;
00183                         sprite->destY = trafMaxY * 16;
00184 
00185                     }
00186                 }
00187             }
00188         }
00189     }
00190 }

00192 
00198 void Micropolis::pushPos(const Position &pos)
00199 {
00200     curMapStackPointer++;
00201     assert(curMapStackPointer < MAX_TRAFFIC_DISTANCE + 1);
00202     curMapStackXY[curMapStackPointer] = pos;
00203 }
00204 
00205 
00211 Position Micropolis::pullPos()
00212 {
00213     assert(curMapStackPointer > 0);
00214     curMapStackPointer--;
00215     return curMapStackXY[curMapStackPointer + 1];
00216 }

00227 bool Micropolis::findPerimeterRoad(Position *pos)
00228 {
00229     /* look for road on edges of zone */
00230     static const short PerimX[12] = {-1, 0, 1, 2, 2, 2, 1, 0,-1,-2,-2,-2};
00231     static const short PerimY[12] = {-2,-2,-2,-1, 0, 1, 2, 2, 2, 1, 0,-1};
00232     short tx, ty;
00233 
00234     for (short z = 0; z < 12; z++) {
00235 
00236         tx = pos->posX + PerimX[z];
00237         ty = pos->posY + PerimY[z];
00238 
00239         if (testBounds(tx, ty)) {
00240 
00241             if (roadTest(map[tx][ty])) {
00242 
00243                 pos->posX = tx;
00244                 pos->posY = ty;
00245 
00246                 return true;
00247             }
00248         }
00249     }
00250 
00251     return false;
00252 }
00253 
00254 
00262 bool Micropolis::findPerimeterTelecom(const Position &pos)
00263 {
00264     /* look for telecom on edges of zone */
00265     static const short PerimX[12] = {-1, 0, 1, 2, 2, 2, 1, 0,-1,-2,-2,-2};
00266     static const short PerimY[12] = {-2,-2,-2,-1, 0, 1, 2, 2, 2, 1, 0,-1};
00267     short tx, ty, tile;
00268 
00269     for (short z = 0; z < 12; z++) {
00270 
00271         tx = pos.posX + PerimX[z];
00272         ty = pos.posX + PerimY[z];
00273 
00274         if (testBounds(tx, ty)) {
00275 
00276             tile = map[tx][ty] & LOMASK;
00277             if (tile >= TELEBASE && tile <= TELELAST) {
00278                 return true;
00279             }
00280         }
00281     }
00282 
00283     return false;
00284 }

00286 
00297 bool Micropolis::tryDrive(const Position &startPos, ZoneType destZone)
00298 {
00299     Direction2 dirLast = DIR2_INVALID;
00300     Position drivePos(startPos);
00301 
00302     /* Maximum distance to try */
00303     for (short dist = 0; dist < MAX_TRAFFIC_DISTANCE; dist++) {
00304 
00305         Direction2 dir = tryGo(drivePos, dirLast);
00306         if (dir != DIR2_INVALID) { // we found a road
00307             drivePos.move(dir);
00308             dirLast = rotate180(dir);
00309 
00310             /* Save pos every other move.
00311              * This also relates to
00312              * Micropolis::trafficDensityMap::MAP_BLOCKSIZE
00313              */
00314             if (dist & 1) {
00315                 pushPos(drivePos);
00316             }
00317 
00318             if (driveDone(drivePos, destZone)) { // if destination is reached
00319                 return true; /* pass */
00320             }
00321 
00322         } else {
00323 
00324             if (curMapStackPointer > 0) { /* dead end, backup */
00325                 curMapStackPointer--;
00326                 dist += 3;
00327             } else {
00328                 return false; /* give up at start  */
00329             }
00330 
00331         }
00332     }
00333 
00334     return false; /* gone MAX_TRAFFIC_DISTANCE */
00335 }
00336 
00337 
00344 Direction2 Micropolis::tryGo(const Position &pos, Direction2 dirLast)
00345 {
00346     Direction2 directions[4];
00347 
00348     // Find connections from current position.
00349     Direction2 dir = DIR2_NORTH;
00350     int count = 0;
00351     for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++) {
00352         if (dir != dirLast && roadTest(getTileFromMap(pos, dir, DIRT))) {
00353             // found a road in an allowed direction
00354             directions[i] = dir;
00355             count++;
00356         } else {
00357             directions[i] = DIR2_INVALID;
00358         }
00359 
00360         dir = rotate90(dir);
00361     }
00362 
00363     if (count == 0) { // dead end
00364         return DIR2_INVALID;
00365     }
00366 
00367     // We have at least one way to go.
00368 
00369     if (count == 1) { // only one solution
00370         for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++) {
00371             if (directions[i] != DIR2_INVALID) {
00372                 return directions[i];
00373             }
00374         }
00375     }
00376 
00377     // more than one choice, draw a random number.
00378     int i = getRandom16() & 3;
00379     while (directions[i] == DIR2_INVALID) {
00380         i = (i + 1) & 3;
00381     }
00382     return directions[i];
00383 }
00384 
00385 
00395 MapTile Micropolis::getTileFromMap(const Position &pos,
00396                                     Direction2 dir, MapTile defaultTile)
00397 {
00398     switch (dir) {
00399 
00400         case DIR2_NORTH:
00401             if (pos.posY > 0) {
00402               return map[pos.posX][pos.posY - 1] & LOMASK;
00403             }
00404 
00405             return defaultTile;
00406 
00407         case DIR2_EAST:
00408             if (pos.posX < WORLD_W - 1) {
00409               return map[pos.posX + 1][pos.posY] & LOMASK;
00410             }
00411 
00412             return defaultTile;
00413 
00414         case DIR2_SOUTH:
00415             if (pos.posY < WORLD_H - 1) {
00416               return map[pos.posX][pos.posY + 1] & LOMASK;
00417             }
00418 
00419             return defaultTile;
00420 
00421         case DIR2_WEST:
00422             if (pos.posX > 0) {
00423               return map[pos.posX - 1][pos.posY] & LOMASK;
00424             }
00425 
00426             return defaultTile;
00427 
00428         default:
00429             return defaultTile;
00430 
00431     }
00432 }

00434 
00441 bool Micropolis::driveDone(const Position &pos, ZoneType destZone)
00442 {
00443     // FIXME: Use macros to determine the zone type: residential, commercial or industrial.
00444     /* commercial, industrial, residential destinations */
00445     static const MapTile targetLow[3] = {COMBASE, LHTHR, LHTHR};
00446     static const MapTile targetHigh[3] = {NUCLEAR, PORT, COMBASE};
00447 
00448     assert(ZT_NUM_DESTINATIONS == LENGTH_OF(targetLow));
00449     assert(ZT_NUM_DESTINATIONS == LENGTH_OF(targetHigh));
00450 
00451     MapTile l = targetLow[destZone]; // Lowest acceptable tile value
00452     MapTile h = targetHigh[destZone]; // Highest acceptable tile value
00453 
00454     if (pos.posY > 0) {
00455         MapTile z = map[pos.posX][pos.posY - 1] & LOMASK;
00456         if (z >= l && z <= h) {
00457             return true;
00458         }
00459     }
00460 
00461     if (pos.posX < (WORLD_W - 1)) {
00462         MapTile z = map[pos.posX + 1][pos.posY] & LOMASK;
00463         if (z >= l && z <= h) {
00464             return true;
00465         }
00466     }
00467 
00468     if (pos.posY < (WORLD_H - 1)) {
00469         MapTile z = map[pos.posX][pos.posY + 1] & LOMASK;
00470         if (z >= l && z <= h) {
00471             return true;
00472         }
00473     }
00474 
00475     if (pos.posX > 0) {
00476         MapTile z = map[pos.posX - 1][pos.posY] & LOMASK;
00477         if (z >= l && z <= h) {
00478             return true;
00479         }
00480     }
00481 
00482     return false;
00483 }
00484 
00485 
00491 bool Micropolis::roadTest(MapValue mv)
00492 {
00493     MapTile tile = mv & LOMASK;
00494 
00495     if (tile < ROADBASE || tile > LASTRAIL) {
00496         return false;
00497     }
00498 
00499     if (tile >= POWERBASE && tile < LASTPOWER) {
00500         return false;
00501     }
00502 
00503     return true;
00504 }
